document_data.name: Kithian Moss
document_data.mainbody: '''Kithian Moss''' was a girl that lived with her family on a [[peat]] farm in the [[Twilight Marsh]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite adventurers league/Defiance in Phlan|11}}
document_data.Relationships: Kithian was the daughter to [[Millivent Moss|Millivent]] and [[Haldred Moss]]. She had four siblings, [[Alleena Moss|Alleena]], [[Bo Moss|Bo]], [[Quayle Moss|Quayle]], and [[Volland Moss|Volland]].
document_data.History: During the 1480s [[DR]],{{ToD-time}} Kithian and her family were attacked on their farm by a band of [[goblin]] raiders from the [[Foulwater]] tribe. Kithian and nearly all of her siblings, along with their father and a number of farmhands were unable to get away. While the exact details of the attack were unknown, it appeared as if they were taken captive by the monstrous creatures. Kithian's mother Millivent managed to escape along with Bo and get away safely to a nearby town.
